about_the_game: Do YOU like magic, guns, and adventure, then this is the game for you. Scrap Magic is a 3D, open world adventure game. Solve puzzles, explore Rusbin's Heart, and restore the city of runes to it's former glory. But beware, the land is as dangerous as ever with monsters and beast roaming freely with no one to challenge their tyranny. Maybe you will be the one to bring safety back to these ancient lands. Maybe in doing so some of the scattered descendants will join you in your endeavors. AND MAYBE you will fix what has been left in nothing but dust and rubble. Only you can truly discover the adventures and challenges that await you in the world of Rusbin.
